1) Installed the x64 bit Office.

6) Was given the final code. Activated my office :).

Steps that worked for me:

1. Install/get a Virtual Clone Drive(VCD)

2. Open " Microsoft Office 2010 Professional Plus x86 & x64 SP1" -- If you installed the  VCD then it should be of type " Virtual Clone Drive " 

3. When you double click, it should open it up as a separate drive --- look under "Computer" - Should be BD-Rom drive....

4. Open up either "x64" or "x86" depending on which one you want

5. TURN OFF CONNECTION TO THE INTERNET----- THIS STEP IS CRUCIAL ------

6. Run the setup.exe in the respective folder

7. Wait.... should take about 5-10 min depending on your computer speed...

@tops.c: no, that doesn't work. 

There are two kinds of Volume Licenses for Office: MAK and KMS. 

KMS is the enterprise version, and requires a real or fake KMS server to work. This torrent is KMS.

MAK is the version that will work over the phone. This torrent is NOT the MAK version.

The Volume Activation Management Tool 2.0 says that my Windows key, which I got from Dreamspark cause I'm a student, is MAK. But it says that my Office installation, which I installed from this torrent, is KMS.
@tops.c: nope, it doesn't work with this torrent.

Hi guys, this is for you beginners. Most of you are trying to get answers because you did not succeed in installing ms2010. Let me tell you something first. This release is still working perfectly.
I downloaded 3 months ago however; I only did install it two days ago. It worked perfectly. Why did it work for most of us and not you? The answer is simple. You do not follow the instructions well.
I did activate it via a Dutch phone number. I did not speak with an operator. I just followed the phone instructions. What you do not know in the instructions included in this torrent download is the questions asked after providing the codes to the automated system is where you bought the software an if it was for private use or professional use. Of course the answers are, for private and at the shop.
So, guys, just try to follow the instructions.
